sentence: Tillis endorsed Cawthorn's primary challenger Chuck Edwards last month, saying Cawthorn has fallen well short of the most basic standards Western North Carolina expects from their representatives.? Tillis has also previously called for his fellow senator, Richard Burr (R-N.C.), to explain himself to the country over a call Burr made to his brother, who then sold shares in February 2020ahead of the stock market crash caused by the coronavirus pandemic.
author: Anna Kaplan
title: Sen. Tillis Calls For Insider Trading Probe Over Rep. Cawthorn's Ties To Let's Go Brandon' Meme Coin

sentence: Tillis endorsed Cawthorn's primary challenger Chuck Edwards last month, saying Cawthorn has fallen well short of the most basic standards Western North Carolina expects from their representatives.? title: Sen. Tillis Calls For Insider Trading Probe Over Rep. Cawthorn's Ties To Let's Go Brandon' Meme Coin

sentence: The senator also addressed his decision to endorse one of Cawthorn's primary challengers, state Sen. Chuck Edwards, and suggested that other North Carolina Republican lawmakers share his concerns about the freshman representative.
author: Andrew Kerr
title: Thom Tillis continues attacks on fellow North Carolina Republican Madison Cawthorn

sentence: A super PAC aligned with Tillis is spending six figures on ads to support one of Cawthorn's Republican primary challengers, state Sen. Chuck Edwards.
author:
Stephanie Akin
Kate Ackley
Mary Ellen McIntire
title: At the Races: Signs of red ahead

title: Madison Cawthorn Keeps Getting Implicated in Possible Crimes
